entries.journal_entry_description: The Sand People are rampaging due to your theft of their relics. They are slaughtering everyone in Mos Espa. You must stop them.
entries.journal_entry_title: Tusken Raider Invasion of Mos Espa: Phase 2
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Send experts to the cloning center. A fully staffed cloning center will provide a second chance when fighting the Tusken Raiders and take some of the edge off of a possible fatal blow.
entries.task01_task_display_string_1: First Expert for the Cloning Center
entries.task01_task_display_string_2: Second Expert for the Cloning Center
entries.task01_task_display_string_3: Third Expert for the Cloning Center
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Send experts to the medical center. A fully operational medical center will aid your efforts by supplying field medics to help with the wounded.
entries.task02_task_display_string_1: First Expert for the Medical Center
entries.task02_task_display_string_2: Second Expert for the Medical Center
entries.task02_task_display_string_3: Third Expert for the Medical Center
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Send experts to the university. Once fully staffed, the researchers at the university can provide valuable insight into the Tusken Raiders which will aid you in driving them out of Mos Espa.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Send experts to the combat hall. Once fully manned, the combat hall will supply trained militia troops to help fight the Tusken Raiders.
entries.task04_task_display_string_1: First Expert for the Combat Hall
entries.task04_task_display_string_2: Second Expert for the Combat Hall
entries.task04_task_display_string_3: Third Expert for the Combat Hall
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Send experts to Watto's shop to help him get it running again. Once his shop is fully crewed, Watto will supply droids to help fight the Tusken Raiders.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Send experts to the starport to help get it operating again. Once online, the starport will supply air support in the battle to drive out the Tusken Raiders.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Do not allow too many Mos Espa citizens to be killed or your efforts will be considered a failure.
entries.task14_journal_entry_title: Failure Condition: Mos Espa Citizens Killed
